channel.title: OpenSUSE on Blah, Cloud
channel.description: Recent content in OpenSUSE on Blah, Cloud

item.title: Replicating SAN on openSUSE with VAAI
item.description: Preamble This article was written a few years back, but never published - it was some work I was doing in my lab to try and get to grips around the work involved in creating a SAN with synchronous replication built in from scratch. It in no way should be used for production, but rather as a learning exercise - as previously stated the instructions are a few years old and version specific, so openSUSE may well now support some of the modules I had to compile and create repos for manually, also DRBD9 has been released and should obviously be used in place of DRBD8 as I have below.

item.title: openSUSE Install Graphics Problems?
item.description: Fixing openSUSE installer having no video output

item.title: Installing MegaRAID Storage Manager on openSUSE
item.description: Guide on how to install and manage LSI RAID cards centrally using MegaRAID Storage Manager
